sentences.sContent: They've been deprived of the fuel necessary to heat their homes.
sentences.sCn: 他们无法得到住房取暖必需的燃料。

remMethod.val: de(去掉) + priv(单个) + e → 从个人身边拿走 → 剥夺

trans.tranOther: If you deprive someone of something that they want or need, you take it away from them, or you prevent them from having it
